statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 17 \\ 16 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -16 \\ -18 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 24 \\ 39 \\ 42 \\ -6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
